Summary: Over the bay in Pt. Vallarta, a strange, multicolored flashing light.. Almost like a ball of energy.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Puerto Vallarta
There were no other sightings in Puerto Vallarta on or around January 15th 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsI lived on the beach front in a condo in Pt. Vallarta, second floor. One night we noticed this flashing light, way up in the sky. It was moving, but staying stationary in it's place.. I got the video camera and when I was able to 'close up' on it, it looked almost like a strange energy force, multi-colored and moving very rapidly, but staying in the same spot. Almost like a squiggly line moving in every direction and changing color. I've never seen anything like it. It stayed there for hours, then it would disappear for a while, then reappear. It wasn't there every night, but did come and go over a period of a few weeks. Then, we never saw it again. I have hours of video footage of it. The video is on a MiniDV8 tape. I could send it to you but I want it back of course. Let me know.
